title: anyone elses clients not opening at all ?
body:
everytime i open it. it just says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel Has Stopped Working" 

plz help

replies.body: You have to uninstall then reinstall. I think there is a manual fix but last time I tried to do that it didn't work and had to end up reinstalling anyways.
last time I had this I had to reinstall
